definition: to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
accord/to make contact/to agree/to consult with/extensive

sentences.english: They are related in many ways and need to be managed in a holistic approach.
sentences.chinese: 她们之间在品牌办理的好些个方面上具备接洽瓜葛性。

sentences.english: She was approached by a headhunter and offered a job with another company.
sentences.chinese: 一间人力仲介公司接洽她并提供另外一家公司的工作。

sentences.english: Efforts to reach Mr. Binh and a government spokesman were unsuccessful.
sentences.chinese: 记者希望接洽范清平和政府发言人，但没有成功。

sentences.english: Usually [funders] are going to approach the women in a small city.
sentences.chinese: 一般情况下，资助者会同某一小城市的妇女接洽。

sentences.english: He declined to identify any of the parties.
sentences.chinese: 随后，他拒绝透露相关接洽方的名字。

sentences.english: The New York program reaches out to good architects, guaranteeing them market-rate fees.
sentences.chinese: 纽约市政府计划接以他们市场价格接洽好的建筑师。

sentences.english: He may want to get in touch with you in the future. Would you leave your card?
sentences.chinese: 他想以后再和你接洽。请留下你的咭片好吗？

sentences.english: We are now sending Comrade Zhang along to get in touch with you.
sentences.chinese: 现派张同志前往你处接洽。

sentences.english: Should you have any further questions, please contact me on the above number.
sentences.chinese: 若有其他题目，请拨以上电话号码与我接洽。

sentences.english: Management representatives should appoint to interface with employee representatives.
sentences.chinese: 管方应指派代表同雇员代表接洽。

sentences.english: Initial contacts between the Chinese and Draka's top management were positive, he says.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，鑫茂与特雷卡高层之间最初的接洽非常乐观。

sentences.english: You could contact the issuing bank for information.
sentences.chinese: 您可以接洽信用卡的发卡银行扣问情况。

sentences.english: In such occation, please contact with us or our special agency directly.
sentences.chinese: 此时，请直接与本公司或特约经销店接洽。

sentences.english: Always ask for additional contact names.
sentences.chinese: 扣问其他接洽人的姓名。

sentences.english: For product return, please contact with your product vendor or seller.
sentences.chinese: 有关退货事宜，请与您的产品供应商或售销商接洽。

sentences.english: You can apply either personally or in letter.
sentences.chinese: 你可以亲自接洽也可以写信。

definition: to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
to come to a decision/to fix on (a date etc)/to determine/to finalize/to nail down (a deal etc)
to cooperate/to collaborate/to work together/cooperation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to lobby/to campaign/to promote (an idea, a product)/(old) to visit various rulers and promote one's political ideas (in the Warring States period)
